source.additionalInfo: For the original data, please see Table 3: Number of Adults Who Were Current Smokers By Sex, Race and Age, Selected Years, 1965-2009. Due to the redesign of the NHIS survey in 1997, comparisons with data from prior years must be conducted with caution.
